page.title: 05GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: There are many different games for children aged 2 to 4. The games differ for girls and boys. The most popular game for these children is playing {"Mummies and Daddies".}Age 4 to 8, children play{"Kiss Catching".}This is when children catch each other to kiss them. From 8 to 12,{"String Tig"}is popular. Children play tig and join up in a long line when they are caught. From 12 to 14,girls do not play games. However,boys play{"Football"}from the age of 4 to 14. Many games which children play today are traditional, such as{"Ring-a-ring} {-a-roses".}This game originates from "The Black Death" in England in 1368. Clapping games are passed on from past generations. Skipping is played whilst many rhymes are chanted by the children. Many games around today have been played for years.
